Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Dawneagle Jetbike
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
An advanced, Heresy-era jetbike, built to the specifications of Vertus Praetors of the Legio Custodes. Fast and nimble, these jetbikes are suitable for cross-country travel and high-speed skirmishing, weaving in and out of the terrain with grace and elegance. 

This particular version is armed with a Hurricane Bolter modified to accept 0.998 cal bolts, giving it more than enough firepower to shred enemy infantry. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1 
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
